statusLine.command: INPUT=$(cat); TIME=$(date +"%H:%M:%S"); DIR=$(basename "$(pwd)" | cut -c1-15); BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null | cut -c1-12); MODEL=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r '.model.display_name // "Claude"' | sed 's/.*Sonnet.*/Sonnet/' | sed 's/.*Opus.*/Opus/' | sed 's/.*Haiku.*/Haiku/' | sed 's/.*/Claude/'); CTX=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r 'if .context_used and .context_limit then "\(.context_used / .context_limit * 100 | floor)%" else "N/A" end'); printf '🕐 \033[36m%s\033[0m | 📁 \033[34m%s\033[0m%s | 🤖 \033[33m%s\033[0m | 📊 %s' "$TIME" "$DIR" "$([ -n \"$BRANCH\" ] && printf ' [\033[32m%s\033[0m]' \"$BRANCH\")" "$MODEL" "$CTX"
